cyclone.name: BETA
cyclone.current_location: about 140 mi SE of Galveston, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: Slowly west-northwest toward the mid-Texas coast, then forecast to slow, turn north, and curve northeast across Louisiana toward Mississippi during mid-week
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the middle Texas coast (around Matagorda Bay/Port O’Connor area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Baffin Bay to Port Aransas, Texas (Tropical Storm Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Port Aransas, Texas to Morgan City, Louisiana (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast from Port Aransas to Morgan City LA and much of southern Louisiana and Mississippi coasts
weather_observation.wind: Occasional tropical-storm-force gusts (mainly 25–35 mph) possible mid-week
weather_observation.storm_surge: Minor surge 1–3 ft possible in Lake Pontchartrain and nearby tidal lakes
weather_observation.rainfall: Heavy rain bands Tuesday–Thursday could total 4–8 inches with locally higher amounts and flash-flood risk
weather_observation.other_hazards: Isolated tornadoes and waterspouts possible as outer rainbands move onshore
